channel.title: My C++ RuneScape Private Server (Which Is Better For Classes?)
channel.description:
Well I Have A Private Server In C++ (Which Is Like WinterLove Because EveryBody Knows How To Code WinterLove!) And You Can See It Here! [url=http://xs231.xs.to/xs231/08393/leetserver788.jpg]http://xs231.xs.to/xs231/08393/leetserver788.jpg[/url]
Kay, but on a more serious note, I'm making a C++ RS2 server (which I hope to be cross-platform, and it's obviously not like moparscape4lifez's retarded shit), and I need an example of how to make both a thread in windows and a thread in *nix. Help would be apricotted.
kthxbai, io9``

item.title: My C++ RuneScape Private Server (Which Is Better For Classes?)
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

On another topic

isnt there a unix compiler for cpp else make the server cpp and the client java or perl

pearl is illegal to use so you must write it in c+ and compile using javac

Read full topic

item.title: My C++ RuneScape Private Server (Which Is Better For Classes?)
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“person1936temp, post:1, topic:234391”]isnt there a unix compiler for cpp else make the server cpp and the client java or perl[/quote]no, there is not a c++ compiler for unix.

Read full topic

item.title: My C++ RuneScape Private Server (Which Is Better For Classes?)
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:19, topic:233019”][quote author=Brett` link=topic=307298.msg2457609#msg2457609 date=1222311044]
No no no no! Base it off of RS2D so it will actually WORK.
[/quote]
Shut the fuck up you inbred, it was a fucking joke…

You have to place the blade of the knife on your forearm, and then firmly slide the blade down your forearm all the way to your wrist. Then, let your hands hang to your sides so the blood flow will naturally cause the wounds to bleed out. After this, you should pass out, then later on die. That should solve your dilemma.

Like this?

As lawl and Unhandled said, I’m gonna use Boost, since with Boost I get threads and asio (i/o lib), so I get two birds with one stone…[/quote]I lol’d at that pic cos i know a guy that has dat tattoo. It also says “In case of emergency, cut here”

Read full topic
item.source: My C++ RuneScape Private Server (Which Is Better For Classes?)

item.title: My C++ RuneScape Private Server (Which Is Better For Classes?)
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Brett`:

No no no no! Base it off of RS2D so it will actually WORK.

Shut the fuck up you inbred, it was a fucking joke…

ThAt0n36Uy:

You have to place the blade of the knife on your forearm, and then firmly slide the blade down your forearm all the way to your wrist. Then, let your hands hang to your sides so the blood flow will naturally cause the wounds to bleed out. After this, you should pass out, then later on die. That should solve your dilemma.

Like this?

wrist-slit.jpg440×640

As lawl and Unhandled said, I’m gonna use Boost, since with Boost I get threads and asio (i/o lib), so I get two birds with one stone…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

ibm.com

Porting C/C++ sources

Software programs are often made to run on systems that are completely different from the system in which the program is coded or developed. This process of adapting software across systems is known as porting. You might need to port software for any...

Take a good read there.
